Articles.Content:
I guess the forums took a dive a while back, but I don't visit that often.

Have to say I'm loving career mode. This is the best update in a while. Nice work squad!

Buzzed Aldrin
Hi Buzzed Aldrin and welcome to the forums. Glad you're enjoying career mode
Welcome! Welcome! If you have having trouble, Look to this guy > http://www.youtube.com/user/szyzyg He talks about KSP science, missions and other things! Have fun!
